description: Naught-y primes, primes with noughts (or zeros).
comments: Intersection of A000040 and A011540. - _Michel Marcus_, Mar 12 2015
links: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) ~ n log n: almost all primes are in this sequence. - _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jul 24 2012
crossrefs: Cf. A000040 (primes), A011540 (numbers that contain a 0).
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Aug 10 2000
